title: Handle with Care
creator_credit: Paul Cox, Andrena Finlay and Anna Landa
brief_description: This film sensitively follows two women who have been diagnosed with breast cancer. Using a docu-drama format, the program explains methods of self-examination, reaction to diagnosis, options of treatment available and the emotional demands and needs which arise from a positive diagnosis.
